page.title: 05Acle Police Station
page.content: Mr. Gleeson asked us whether we would go to the Police Station. We walked up to the Police Station and we rang the bell. We were really nervous. We told them we were from Blofield School and what we were doing. He asked us in and we asked him, and some other policemen questions. They gave us brief answeres and were very nice. After we'd finished we said godbye and went back to the minibus. We found out that the busiest time is during the summer when there are plenty of holidaymakers. A lot of time is spent with traffic work and problems.There is not a lot of big crime, only smaller offences.
